pages.hint_text: This is the unique reference number for the property title

pages.question_text: What type of legal document is this?
pages.hint_text: Select the document type that applies

pages.question_text: What is the legal representative registration number?
pages.hint_text: Enter the registration number for the legal representative handling this matter

pages.question_text: What type of contractual control applies?
What is the territorial extent of the contract?
Are there other territorial extent details to specify?

pages.hint_text: Describe how the boundary or extent is shown

pages.question_text: What is the name of the grantee?
pages.hint_text: Enter the full name of the person or organisation receiving the rights

pages.question_text: Which registration body applies to the grantee?
pages.hint_text: Select the body where the grantee is registered

pages.question_text: What is the grantee's company number?
pages.hint_text: Enter the company registration number, or 'Not applicable' if an individual

pages.question_text: What is the name of the grantor?
pages.hint_text: Enter the full name of the person or organisation granting the rights

pages.question_text: Which registration body applies to the grantor?
pages.hint_text: Select the body where the grantor is registered

pages.question_text: What is the grantor's company number?
pages.hint_text: Enter the company registration number, or 'Not applicable' if an individual

pages.question_text: What is the date of the agreement?
pages.hint_text: Enter the date when the agreement was signed

pages.question_text: What is the expiry date of the agreement?
pages.hint_text: Enter the date when the agreement expires

pages.question_text: What conditions apply for contract extension?

pages.information:
## Check your answers before submitting

Review all the information you have provided. You can go back to change any answers if needed.

**Contract Details**
- Title number
- Legal document type
- Legal representative registration
- Type of contractual control
- Territorial extent
- Boundary description

**Grantee Details**
- Name
- Registration body
- Company number

**Grantor Details**
- Name
- Registration body  
- Company number

**Additional Information**
- Date of agreement
- Expiry date
- Conditions for contract extension

If you are satisfied with your answers, click 'Submit application'.
